description: This template allows you to create a RHEL 8.4 VM running JBoss EAP EAP 7.3/EAP 7.4 and also deploy a web application called JBoss-EAP on Azure, you can log into the admin console using the JBoss EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application named JBoss-EAP on Azure on a standalone node of JBoss EAP EAP 7.3/EAP 7.4 running on RHEL 8.4 VM.
